a88-1.resolution: wq-375 completed in B#332 (s1152). Root cause identified: E sessions ended in ~3min, skipping intel phase. Fix: mechanical post-hook enforcement (37-d049-enforcement_E.sh) + nudge injection into pre-hook (36-engagement-seed_E.sh). Commit 9dfc694.
a88-1.metric_after: 100% post-fix (1/1 — s1153 PASSED with 1 intel entry)
a88-1.notes: Only 1 post-fix data point (s1153). Mechanical enforcement appears to work — s1153 captured 1 intel entry where prior 3 consecutive E sessions captured 0. Marking resolved_unverified until 3+ post-fix E sessions confirm sustained improvement. The fix is fundamentally different from prior R session attempts (prompt-based) — this is hook-based mechanical enforcement.

a88-2.resolution: wq-376 completed in B#331 (s1154). Investigation confirmed A#88 recommendation was a false positive — ctxly.json exists on disk (gitignored), BRIEFING.md exists and is tracked. All references in external.js, cred-audit.mjs, and migrate-domain.sh are valid. B#331 fixed actual stale refs: agent-profiles.json and github-mappings.json had old IP, updated to terminalcraft.xyz.
